TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridBoolColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle

summary.span: 指定資料行，其中每個儲存格含有用來表示布林值的核取方塊。

span.span: Specifies a column in which each cell contains a check box for representing a Boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自`abstract`類別。The derives from the `abstract` class . 在執行階段包含每個資料格中的核取方塊，根據預設，具有三種狀態： 檢查 (`true`)、 取消核取 (`false`)，和。At run time, the contains check boxes in each cell that have three states by default: checked (`true`), unchecked (`false`), and . 若要使用兩個狀態的核取方塊，將屬性設`false`。To use two-state check boxes, set the property to `false`. 加入至類別的屬性包括， ，和。Properties added to the class include , , and . 這些屬性會指定每個資料行的狀態資料的值。These properties specify the value underlying each of the column's states. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會先建立新並將它加入的。The following code example first creates a new and adds it to the of a . [!code-cpp[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/CPP/boolcolumn.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/CS/boolcolumn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/VB/boolcolumn.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於一般的實作，這個方法 (如中所述類別)，則方法沒有站台的控制項編輯儲存格的值。Unlike the typical implementation of this method (as described in the class), the method does not site a control for editing the cell value. 相反地，繪製核取方塊時呼叫方法。Instead, a check box is drawn when the method is called.

summary.span: 取得要包含指定特定值的儲存格之最佳寬度和高度。

span.span: Gets the optimum width and height of a cell given a specific value to contain.
A that contains the drawing information for the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您調整資料行所顯示的值為基礎。The method allows you to resize the column based on the value displayed. 例如，如果資料格包含特別大的值，您可以使用值為基礎的方法來傳回儲存格的最佳大小。For example, if a cell contains an especially large value, you can use the method to return the optimum size of the cell based on the value. 最佳的大小會考量大小的字串，但也用來顯示它的字型。The optimum size takes into account not only the size of the string, but also the font used to display it.
